valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 16 Oct 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 17 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: New high expected Fair Isle 1027 by 0600 tomorrow. High northern Ireland 1030 and west Scotland 1030 both dissipating

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northwesterly 3 to 5, becoming variable 3 or less later. In east, northwesterly veering northerly, 4 to 6.
Sea state
In west, moderate. in east, moderate, occasionally rough at first.
Weather
Showers.
Visibility
In west, good. In east, good, occasionally moderate.
